data.name: Exception_ValueMustBePositive
data.value: The value '{0}' is not within the valid range for the {1} property; the value being assigned must be a positive number.

data.name: Exception_DocumentNotOpen
data.value: The document has not been opened. Use the StartDocument method to begin the document.

data.name: Exception_InvalidCulture
data.value: "The value '{0}' is not the name of a valid culture for the local machine."

data.name: Exception_ParagraphNotClosed
data.value: Closure of a previously opened paragraph is still pending. Each call to the StartParagraph method must be balanced by a call to the EndParagraph method.

data.name: Exception_ParagraphNotClosedSectionStarted
data.value: A section cannot be defined because closure of an opened paragraph is still pending. A section must be defined at a point where the document is open, but no paragraphs are open.

data.name: Exception_ParagraphNotClosedTableStarted
data.value: A table cannot be started because closure of an opened paragraph is still pending. A table can be nested within a cell of another table, but cannot be nested within a paragraph.

data.name: Exception_ParagraphNotClosedTableRowStarted
data.value: A table row cannot be started because closure of an opened paragraph is still pending. Use the EndParagraph method to close the paragraph.

data.name: Exception_ParagraphNotClosedTableCellStarted
data.value: A table cell cannot be started because closure of an opened paragraph is still pending. Use the EndParagraph method to close the paragraph.

data.name: Exception_ParagraphNotOpen
data.value: The operation cannot be performed because there is currently no open paragraph. Use the StartParagraph method to begin a paragraph.

data.name: Exception_PropertyValueOutOfRange
data.value: The value {0} is out of range. The '{1}' property must be set to a value within the range of {2} and {3} ({4}), inclusive.

data.name: Exception_WriterError
data.value: An exception was thrown by the XmlWriter.

data.name: Exception_TableNotOpen
data.value: The operation cannot be performed because there is currently no open table. Use the StartTable method to begin a table.

data.name: Exception_TableNotClosed
data.value: Closure of a previously opened table is still pending. Each call to the StartTable method must be balanced by a call to the EndTable method.

data.name: Exception_RowNotClosed
data.value: Closure of a previously opened table row is still pending. Each call to the StartTableRow method must be balanced by a call to the EndTableRow method.

data.name: Exception_NestedRow
data.value: A table row cannot be added because closure of a previously opened table row is still pending, and nested table rows are not supported. Use the EndTableRow method to close the table row that is currently open.

data.name: Exception_RowNotOpen
data.value: The operation cannot be performed because there is currently no open table row. Use the StartTableRow method to begin a table row.

data.name: Exception_NestedParagraph
data.value: A paragraph cannot be opened because closure of an opened paragraph is still pending. Nested paragraphs are not supported.

data.name: Exception_NestedTable
data.value: A table cannot be opened because closure of a previously opened table is still pending. Nested tables are supported, but must appear within a table cell of the parent table.

data.name: Exception_CellNotClosed
data.value: Closure of a previously opened table cell is still pending. Each call to the StartTableCell method must be balanced by a call to the EndTableCell method.

data.name: Exception_NestedCell
data.value: A table cell cannot be added because closure of a previously opened table cell is still pending, and nested table cells are not supported. Use the EndTableCell method to close the table cell that is currently open.

data.name: Exception_CellNotOpen
data.value: The operation cannot be performed because there is currently no open table cell. Use the StartTableCell method to begin a table cell.

data.name: Exception_PackageFactoryNullOnCLR2
data.value: When running under version 2.0 of the .NET framework, you must provide an IPackageFactory implementation to handle the packaging of data. If you are using version 3.0 (or higher) of the .NET Framework, use the Infragistics3.Documents.IO assembly instead, and the packaging will be handled by the WindowsBase class.

data.name: Exception_AssociatedWithDifferentWriter
data.value: The instance being assigned was created by a different writer, and cannot be assigned to this object.

data.name: Exception_HeaderWriterError
data.value: An exception was thrown while writing content to the header part of a section. Check the InnerException for details.

data.name: Exception_FooterWriterError
data.value: An exception was thrown while writing content to the footer part of a section. Check the InnerException for details.

data.name: Exception_DocumentClosureError
data.value: An exception was thrown while closing the document. Check the InnerException for details.

data.name: Exception_HeaderFooterWriterClosureError
data.value: An exception was thrown while closing a header or footer. Check the InnerException for details.

data.name: Exception_HeaderFooterWriterNotClosed
data.value: The document writer was closed, but closure of a header/footer writer is still pending. Header/footer writers must be properly closed prior to closure of the document writer.

data.name: Exception_HeaderFooterWriterNotOpened
data.value: The document writer was closed, but a header/footer writer that was previously created was never opened. Any header/footer writers that are created must be opened and properly closed.

data.name: Exception_MissingHyperlinkAddress
data.value: A hyperlink must have a valid address.

data.name: Exception_AddHyperlink_BadUri
data.value: The value '{0}' could not be specified as a valid Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).

data.name: Exception_RotatableShape_Rotation
data.value: The value must be within the range of -180 to 180.

data.name: Exception_RowClosedNoCell
data.value: The table row could not be closed because it contains no table cells. A table row must contain at least one table cell.

data.name: Exception_CellNotClosedTableClosed
data.value: The table could not be closed because closure of a previously opened table cell is still pending. Use the EndTableCell method to close the table cell.

data.name: Exception_RowNotClosedTableClosed
data.value: The table could not be closed because closure of a previously opened table row is still pending. Use the EndTableRow method to close the table row.

data.name: WordDocumentWriter_TooManyColumns
data.value: A table cannot contain {0} columns; a table must have at least one column and no more than {1}.

data.name: Exception_PaddingTextParseFailedFormat
data.value: The specified string: '{0}' cannot be converted to a Padding object. Please specify the padding in the following format: "left, top, right, bottom"

data.name: Exception_TableOpenSectionStarted
data.value: A section cannot be defined because a table is currently open. Sections can only be defined for root-level content blocks.

data.name: Exception_RowOpenSectionStarted
data.value: A section cannot be defined because a table row is currently open. Sections can only be defined for root-level content blocks.

data.name: Exception_CellOpenSectionStarted
data.value: A section cannot be defined because a table cell is currently open. Sections can only be defined for root-level content blocks.

data.name: Exception_SectionProperties_MaxPageSize
data.value: The specified value, ({0}), is out of range. The maximum page size for a document section is (22" x 22").

data.name: Exception_NoImageEncoder
data.value: Images cannot be added to the document because no Infragistics.Imaging.IImageEncoder implementation has been assigned to the ImageEncoder property. Because the Silverlight runtime provides no intrinsic support for the encoding of image information, the WordDocumentWriter requires a reference to an IImageEncoder implementation in order to serialize image information.
